Title: Something on the Horizon
Description:
Brann's scouts have reported sightings of reinforcements approaching the shores of Khaz Algar.

He's put out the call for adventurers to join him in Dornogal.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Brann Bronzebeard in Dornogal.
RewardText: I've 'eard reports o' reinforcements approaching the isle. Ye know Khaz Algar inside and out--they'll need yer expertise.
